name: kleine-betonpomp
description: Blank scaffold for [OctoberCMS](https://github.com/octobercms/october) which includes [Twitter Bootstrap](http://getbootstrap.com/), [jQuery](https://jquery.com/) and [Font Awesome](https://fortawesome.github.io/Font-Awesome/). Built using [Less](http://lesscss.org/).
author: getRight
